verses.verse: יְשֻׂשׂ֥וּם <S%H7797><s%> ye-su-Sum shall be glad מִדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> mid-Bar The wilderness וְצִיָּ֑ה <S%H6723><s%> ve-tzi-Yah; and the solitary place וְתָגֵ֧ל <S%H1523><s%> ve-ta-Gel shall rejoice עֲרָבָ֛ה <S%H6160><s%> 'a-ra-Vah for them and the desert וְתִפְרַ֖ח <S%H6524><s%> ve-tif-Rach and blossom כַּחֲבַצָּֽלֶת׃ <S%H2261><s%> ka-cha-vatz-Tza-let. as the rose

פָּרֹ֨חַ <S%H6524><s%> pa-Ro-ach It shall blossom תִּפְרַ֜ח <S%H6524><s%> tif-Rach abundantly וְתָגֵ֗ל <S%H1523><s%> ve-ta-Gel, and rejoice אַ֚ף <S%H637><s%> 'af with גִּילַ֣ת <S%H1525><s%> gi-Lat even with joy וְרַנֵּ֔ן <S%H7442><s%> ve-ran-Nen, and shout כְּב֤וֹד <S%H3519><s%> ke-Vod the glory הַלְּבָנוֹן֙ <S%H3844><s%> hal-le-va-nOn of Lebanon נִתַּן־ <S%H5414><s%> nit-tan- shall be given לָ֔הּ Lah, הֲדַ֥ר <S%H1926><s%> ha-Dar unto it the excellency הַכַּרְמֶ֖ל <S%H3760><s%> hak-kar-Mel of Carmel וְהַשָּׁר֑וֹן <S%H8289><s%> ve-hash-sha-Ron; and Sharon הֵ֛מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah They יִרְא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> yir-'U they shall see כְבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> che-Vod- the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD הֲדַ֥ר <S%H1926><s%> ha-Dar [and] the excellency אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. of our God ס sa-Mek

חַזְּק֖וּ <S%H2388><s%> chaz-ze-Ku Strengthen יָדַ֣יִם <S%H3027><s%> ya-Da-yim hands רָפ֑וֹת <S%H7504><s%> ra-Fot; ye the weak וּבִרְכַּ֥יִם <S%H1290><s%> u-vir-Ka-yim knees כֹּשְׁל֖וֹת <S%H3782><s%> ko-she-Lot the feeble אַמֵּֽצוּ׃ <S%H553><s%> 'am-Me-tzu. and confirm

אִמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> 'im-Ru Say לְנִמְהֲרֵי־ <S%H4116><s%> le-nim-ha-rei- to them [that are] of a fearful לֵ֔ב <S%H3820><s%> Lev, heart חִזְק֖וּ <S%H2388><s%> chiz-Ku Be strong אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay תִּירָ֑אוּ <S%H3372><s%> ti-Ra-'u; fear הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem not behold your God נָקָ֣ם <S%H5359><s%> na-Kam [with] vengeance יָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo, will come גְּמ֣וּל <S%H1576><s%> ge-Mul [with] a recompence אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, [even] God ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he יָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo he will come וְיֹשַׁעֲכֶֽם׃ <S%H3467><s%> ve-yo-sha-'a-Chem. and save

אָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> 'az Then תִּפָּקַ֖חְנָה <S%H6491><s%> tip-pa-Kach-nah shall be opened עֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei Then the eyes עִוְרִ֑ים <S%H5787><s%> 'iv-Rim; of the blind וְאָזְנֵ֥י <S%H241><s%> ve-'a-ze-Nei and the ears חֵרְשִׁ֖ים <S%H2795><s%> che-re-Shim of the deaf תִּפָּתַֽחְנָה׃ <S%H6605><s%> tip-pa-Tach-nah. shall be unstopped

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> 'az Then יְדַלֵּ֤ג <S%H1801><s%> ye-dal-Leg [man] leap כָּֽאַיָּל֙ <S%H354><s%> ka-'ai-Yal as an hart פִּסֵּ֔חַ <S%H6455><s%> pis-Se-ach, Then shall the lame וְתָרֹ֖ן <S%H7442><s%> ve-ta-Ron sing לְשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> le-Shon and the tongue אִלֵּ֑ם <S%H483><s%> 'il-Lem; of the dumb כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for נִבְקְע֤וּ <S%H1234><s%> niv-ke-'U break out בַמִּדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> vam-mid-Bar for in the wilderness מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim, shall waters וּנְחָלִ֖ים <S%H5158><s%> u-ne-cha-Lim and streams בָּעֲרָבָֽה׃ <S%H6160><s%> ba-'a-ra-Vah. in the desert

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will become הַשָּׁרָב֙ <S%H8273><s%> hash-sha-Rav And the parched ground לַאֲגַ֔ם <S%H98><s%> la-'a-Gam, shall become a pool וְצִמָּא֖וֹן <S%H6774><s%> ve-tzim-ma-'on and the thirsty land לְמַבּ֣וּעֵי <S%H4002><s%> le-mab-Bu-'ei springs מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim; of water בִּנְוֵ֤ה <S%H5116><s%> bin-Veh in the habitation תַנִּים֙ <S%H8577><s%> tan-Nim of dragons רִבְצָ֔הּ <S%H7258><s%> riv-Tzah, where each lay חָצִ֖יר <S%H2682><s%> cha-Tzir [shall be] grass לְקָנֶ֥ה <S%H7070><s%> le-ka-Neh with reeds וָגֹֽמֶא׃ <S%H1573><s%> va-Go-me. and rushes

וְהָיָה־ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-yah- become שָׁ֞ם <S%H8033><s%> sham will be there מַסְל֣וּל <S%H4547><s%> mas-Lul And an highway וָדֶ֗רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> va-De-rech, shall be there and a way וְדֶ֤רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> ve-De-rech The way הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh of holiness יִקָּ֣רֵא <S%H7121><s%> yik-Ka-re and it shall be called לָ֔הּ Lah, לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- will not יַעַבְרֶ֥נּוּ <S%H5674><s%> ya-'av-Ren-nu shall not pass over טָמֵ֖א <S%H2931><s%> ta-Me the unclean וְהוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> ve-hu- he לָ֑מוֹ la-mo; הֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ho-Lech it but it [shall be] for those the wayfaring men דֶּ֛רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech way וֶאֱוִילִ֖ים <S%H191><s%> ve-'e-vi-Lim though fools לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo will not יִתְעֽוּ׃ <S%H8582><s%> yit-'U. shall not err

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- No יִהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become שָׁ֜ם <S%H8033><s%> sham will be there אַרְיֵ֗ה <S%H738><s%> 'ar-Yeh, No lion וּפְרִ֤יץ <S%H6530><s%> u-fe-Ritz shall be there nor [any] ravenous חַיּוֹת֙ <S%H2416><s%> chai-yOt beast בַּֽל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- Nor יַעֲלֶ֔נָּה <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Len-nah, shall go up לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo No תִמָּצֵ֖א <S%H4672><s%> tim-ma-Tze thereon it shall not be found שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham; there וְהָלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> ve-ha-le-Chu shall walk גְּאוּלִֽים׃ <S%H1350><s%> ge-'u-Lim. there but the redeemed

וּפְדוּיֵ֨י <S%H6299><s%> u-fe-du-Yei And the ransomed יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD יְשֻׁב֗וּן <S%H7725><s%> ye-shu-Vun, shall return וּבָ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> u-Va-'u and come צִיּוֹן֙ <S%H6726><s%> tzi-yOn to Zion בְּרִנָּ֔ה <S%H7440><s%> be-rin-Nah, with songs וְשִׂמְחַ֥ת <S%H8057><s%> ve-sim-Chat joy עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam and everlasting עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon רֹאשָׁ֑ם <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sham; upon their heads שָׂשׂ֤וֹן <S%H8342><s%> sa-Son and gladness וְשִׂמְחָה֙ <S%H8057><s%> ve-sim-Chah joy יַשִּׂ֔יגוּ <S%H5381><s%> yas-Si-gu, they shall obtain וְנָ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> ve-Na-su shall flee away יָג֥וֹן <S%H3015><s%> ya-Gon and sorrow וַאֲנָחָֽה׃ <S%H585><s%> va-'a-na-Chah. and sighing פ Peh
